featured.text: The police officer showed us pictures of drunk driving accidents to highlight the importance of staying _____ on the road.
There were many sayings about their desire for alcohol, such as “drunk as a German.”
Today, tea can be drunk at any time of the day, and accounts for over two-fifths of all beverages consumed in Britain—with the exception of water.
Many 25. (A) drink (B) to drink (C) drinking (D) drunk 26.
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Cars will refuse to start if the driver is drunk.

definition.zh_def: 醉酒的，因飲酒過量而失去理智或控制的狀態。
definition.en_def: In a state of intoxication caused by consuming too much alcohol.
definition.example: He was so drunk that he could barely stand.
